hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: A packet of envelopes www.anabolic.org It implies that it must be proven that eradicating mosquitoes WILL have an adverse impact, whereas it should be the other way around. The burden of proof should lie with the 'eradicators'. Before the idea of eradicating 3,500 species of mosquito for the benefit of one (humans) is seriously considered, it must be proven that eradication WILL NOT affect our complex ecosystems. We shouldn't forget the precautionary principle.
